titleInfo.title: A C++ Implementation of the reversed Attentional Vector Sum (rAVS) model

mods.abstract: This software implements the reversed Attentional Vector Sum (rAVS) model proposed by Kluth, Burigo, Knoeferle (2016) in C++. It also implements the AVS model by Regier & Carlson (2001). Both are models of spatial language understanding. Furthermore, it provides algorithms to evaluate these models on empirical data. This software depends on Computational Geometry Algorithms Library (CGAL) and the GNU scientific library (gsl). Further information on how to use this software is provided in the documentation.
